description: Single storey side/rear (wrap around) extension; first floor rear extension; lowering of height of the first-floor parapet; alterations of fenestration to the rear elevation excluding the incorporation of a Juliet balcony to the second floor rear elevation (part-retrospective, part-modified, part-proposed) (Reconsultation)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): 2202-PL-001 Location Map; 2202-PL-002 Existing Site Plan; 2202-PL-003 Proposed Site Plan; 2202-PL-010 Rev B Existing Ground Floor Plan; 2202-PL-011 Rev A Proposed Ground Floor Plan; 2202-PL-020 Rev A Existing First Floor Plan; 2202-PL-021 Rev A Proposed First Floor Plan; 2202-PL-040 Existing Front Elevation; 2202-PL-041 Proposed Front Elevation; 2202-PL-042 Rev A Existing Rear Elevation; 2202-PL-043 Rev A Proposed Rear Elevation; 2202-PL-044 Rev A Existing Side Elevation 1; 2202-PL-045 Proposed Side Elevation 1; 2202-PL-046 Existing Side Elevation 2; 2202-PL-047 Proposed Side Elevation 2; 2202-PL-050 Rev A Existing Section AA; 2202-PL-051 Rev A Proposed Section A; BR-001_Planning Submission Rev A Design & Access Statement prepared by ArchiSpace dated May 2022.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7A and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021). | The side first floor window, shall be obscure glazed and non-openable below 1.70m from floor level, unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from overlooking in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
